name: Daisy Wild Eau De Parfum Gift Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Fruity Florals.Key Notes:Banana Blossom, Jasmine, Vetiver.Set Description:Gift the re[Marc]able. This Marc Jacobs Fragrances Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum gift set includes everything she needs to feel special: her favorite floral fragrance, plus a handy, pocket-size 0.33 oz pen spray for an irresistible scent on the go. Holiday gifts don't get much more perfect than this..About the Fragrance:The adventurous, bold, and feminine Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum for women exudes a freshness reminiscent of a floral bouquet of wildflowers. It inspires you to reconnect with nature and embody your young, free-spirited self..This Set Contains:- 1.6 oz/ 50 mL Marc Jacobs Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Linalool, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alcohol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Farnesol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Benzyl Benzoate, Methyl 2-Octynoate, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Eugenol, Isoeugenol, Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Green 3 (Ci 42053), Red 4 (Ci 14700).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply Marc Jacobs Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum behind the ears, at the wrists, inner elbows and chest.-Tuck the Marc Jacobs Daisy Wild Eau de Parfum pen spray into your bag to take the enticing perfume for women on the go.
